name: 莊欣慈
objective:
本課程旨在介紹如何加強英文基礎文法修辭，以及學習短段落寫作的常見文體；讓學生熟稔運用基本文法，以正確且清晰地表達其構思。

This course is intended to provide an overview of basic English grammar. The grammatical concepts taught in this course are used as a background for students to construct sentences and short paragraphs that convey ideas effectively and clearly.
schedule:
Week(s)	
1	Orientation
2	Unit 1 – Parts of Speech
3	Unit 2 – Sentence Patterns
4	Pre-test
5	Unit 3 – Voice
6	Unit 4 – Linking Verbs
7	Unit 5 – Auxiliary Verbs
8	Review
9	Midterm Examination
10	Unit 6 – Determiners 
11	Unit 7 – Simple Present & Present Progressive Tense
12	Unit 8 – Simple Past & Past Progressive Tense
13	Unit 9 – Future & Future Progressive Tense
14	Unit 10 – Perfect Tense
15-16	Review
17	Post-test
18	Final Examination
scorePolicy:
上課表現 (活動參與、課堂小考等)  40%
筆記寫作  30%
期中文法與寫作測驗  15%
期末文法與寫作測驗  15%
